Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Senior Consultant Specialist In this role, you will:Have to work in shifts and be on “On call ROTA”.
Have to possess good knowledge of platform activities, incident, problem management and production support processes of tickets and defect management. 
Have to possess knowledge on REST API and DevOps automated CI/CD pipeline and deployments will be an advantage
Have to possess substantial experience in working for production support in digital systems.
Get an experience working in DevOps environment 
Get an experience working in Splunk and AppDynamics.
Get an experience working in automation related tasks and deployment using Python, Jenkins.Job Details
